title: Interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream: If a man sees in a dream, and hears the sound of my hand exploding, then this is a sign that bad news will arrive and be heard. The dreamer will be exposed to many problems that cause him sadness and anguish. See also: The explosion portends devastation and devastation, the infection of a person with a disease. It also indicates many material and moral losses. Which the dreamer will incur. If the viewer is exposed to thick black smoke directly in his face, this indicates that there are many problems in the work of the opinion. Interpreter scholars have interpreted the vision of the explosion and the dreamer’s injury to Ian by this explosion in the dream, with the damage that will be caused to the opinion. It creates many problems for him. Such as the explosion sound of planes, bombs, etc. It portends trouble. Disagreements can reach the point of fighting. In the event that the explosion occurs inside the house that the fortuneteller has hidden. This indicates the psychological and moral instability that the opinion suffers from. If a pregnant woman hears an explosion in her dream, this means that her due date is approaching and the family will be happy And it is easy. It is also the sound of the explosion that portends the presence of many marital problems and existing disputes. And instability between the spouses. It also explains the arrival of unwanted words, anything that offends the face of the fortuneteller. This vision also shows that the dreamer will be exposed to the illusion of health and major problems in his life. Interpretation Seeing an explosion in the sky indicates seeing an explosion in the sky in very good and plentiful food for the pioneer. It is also possible that this vision indicates many problems. Trials and tribulations that the dreamer is exposed to in his life. Interpretation of seeing the sound of an explosion in a dream. Seeing hearing the sound of an explosion in a dream indicates warning and denial. The dreamer of something. It also indicates the many rumors to which the dreamer is exposed. It also explains the fluctuations to which the fortuneteller is exposed during his life. If divorced women hear the sound of explosions with their ears in a dream, this indicates that they are exposed to rumors. And some talk about bad intentions. But if an explosion occurs and she is not injured This woman is the result of this explosion, this indicates her survival. He has overcome many problems and the difficult period that he is going through at this time. Also, the explosion caused by the pipe, the power grid, or other things causes many explosions. This shows the many problems that women and people face Abusers around her who want to put her down. Interpretation of seeing an explosion in a dream for an unmarried and married woman. Seeing an explosion in a dream indicates unrelated. In the rumors circulating in tongues, people say what is said about her. That is if the explosion was without flame or fire. It also indicates the presence of people in her life who harbor hatred and malice. towards her. Or the presence of a young man who speaks ill of her among people. It also indicates this girl’s bad behavior and the parents’ dissatisfaction with the behavior resulting from it. It is also a signal for this girl to abandon her career because it will bring her many problems and failures. It also indicates that in a dream this girl commits sins and then From God Almighty. But if a married woman sees in her dream the sound of an explosion, this indicates a large number of...

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about gold for a single woman from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about wearing two gold rings for a single woman, and the interpretation of a dream about finding gold for a single woman.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about being free: Gold is one of the things that we often see in dreams, as it is one of the types of adornments that women always want to buy. The great dream interpreters have interpreted this dream with different interpretations and different indicators, some of which are good and some of which are bad depending on the dreamer’s condition, and this is what we will learn about. It is discussed in this article. Interpretation of a dream about freedom by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about gold for a single woman? Interpretation scholars believe that the interpretation of a dream about gold for a single woman is one of the good dreams that bring abundant goodness to the female dreamer. The interpretation of this dream is as follows: Seeing gold in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence. On her determination to get married, stabilize her married life, and enjoy a happy and bright future, and God knows best. When an unmarried woman buys gold in her dream, this is an indication of her connection to a young man with good morals, and this dream can also be an indication that she will find a job suitable for her qualifications. When an unmarried woman sees In her dream, gold was lost from her, this is a warning to hear bad news and a period full of worries and troubles, but if she finds this lost gold, this is evidence of the presence of evil and it means people in her life. Interpretation of the dream of gold for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of gold for unmarried women in a dream on As follows: Seeing gold in a dream may be evidence that the dreamer is suffering from an illness, and when a married woman sees gold in her dream, this is evidence that she is suffering from some psychological problems and worries in the current period. A single man seeing gold in her dream is one of the praiseworthy visions because it It portends improvement in all matters of her life in the coming period. Ibn Sirin also believes that a single girl seeing a gold bracelet or bracelet in her dream is good news for her about an imminent marriage. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a wreath of golden flowers, this promises her good news that she will marry a wealthy young man and her life with him will be full of happiness. And pleasure. But an unmarried woman who sees broken gold in her dream is one of the unfavorable visions, because it portends the death of someone from her family, and if this girl is engaged, this is a warning to her that she will be separated from her. Khatib. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a golden ring in a dream for a single woman. When a single, unengaged woman sees a golden ring in her dream, this dream is evidence that there is a young man. He has a good reputation and a resume that he will propose to in the near future. Seeing an engagement ring for an unmarried girl in her dream is good news for a soon marriage and a stable life. But if an unmarried girl sees a broken engagement ring in a dream, this is a warning that she will be distant from her fiancé. Seeing an unmarried woman with a tight ring in a dream is evidence that she is suffering from some crises and financial problems, and it is possible that a gold ring in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence. A

title: Interpretation of seeing rain by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: See the rain has many meanings and connotations for dreamers and makes them desperate to know it, and in the following article we will learn about the most important words circulating on this topic that were presented to us by our distinguished scholars. Let's read the following.See RainThe dreamer seeing rain in the dream indicates that he will have many good things in his future life as a result of his desire to do things that please the Lord (to Him be glory) and avoid everything that displeases Him.If one sees rain in his dream, this is a sign of improvement His relationship with someone who has been away from him for a long time and the restoration of friendship between them as it was before. In the event that the dreamer watches the rain during her sleep, this indicates his ability to overcome many of the things that made him feel very upset and he will feel more comfortable after that. Seeing the dreamer in a dream About rain: It symbolizes the occurrence of many good events in his life that will make him very happy. Seeing rain by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees rain in a dream as a sign that he will achieve many things that he dreamed of and will be very happy with them. If one sees rain in his dream This is evidence of his excellence in his work, and this matter will make him occupy a high position among others around him. If the dreamer sees rain falling in torrents during his sleep, this expresses avoiding sorrows and turning the following days into joy and happiness. Seeing the dreamer in a dream with rain symbolizes things The good things that will happen in his life will make him feel very good. What is the interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a single woman? A single woman who sees rain in a dream shows her ability to get rid of the things that she felt very upset about in the previous days and she will be more comfortable and happy after that. If he sees If the dreamer sees rain during his sleep, this is a sign that there are many changes that will occur in her life that will make her very satisfied. If the dreamer sees rain in his dream, this indicates the abundant goodness that he will receive that will make her feel good. Seeing rain in a girl’s dream symbolizes To her recovery from an illness that made her feel very tired over the past few days, and her condition gradually improved after that. What is the interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a single woman? If a single woman dreams that she is walking in the rain, this is a sign of the good qualities that make many people love being around her. And they befriend her. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is walking in the rain, this indicates good things that will happen to her and will make her very comfortable. The dreamer seeing in her dream that she is walking in the rain and getting completely wet symbolizes that she will get into a big problem that she will not be able to solve easily at all. Seeing A girl walking in the rain in her dream indicates the good psychological state that prevails over her as a result of her guard avoiding everything that bothers her. What is the interpretation of a dream about rain in the summer for a single woman? Seeing rain in the summer for unmarried women in a dream indicates the end of the difficulties they faced in the previous days and improvement. Great in their circumstances after that

title: Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an in a dream Many people are looking for an interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an in a dream, and reading the Qur’an indicates the prosperity of life, increased livelihood, and salvation from evil and conspiracy. Dream through the site Different. The best that has been said in the interpretation of reciting the Qur’an in a dream The Qur’an is the last of the books and news that God Almighty sent down from heaven to the world, and this is a miracle that began more than 1400 years ago and continues to this day and will continue until we perish and we will not perish because the Messenger of Truth Muhammad bin Jaa’ came with the miracle of the Qur’an. Reading the Qur’an in a dream has many benefits and blessings for the dreamer, and to continue these advantages, you must be careful not to talk about your dreams with anyone. Interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream for a girl According to the verse, the interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an in a dream varies between rewards and warnings, but in the latter, as narrated by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and other famous interpreters, there are good interpretations and signs. That Imam Al-Sadiq explained and spoke about the best interpretation of the dream of reading the Qur’an in a dream: Interpretation of dreams of reading the Qur’an in a dream Regardless of who sees herself reading the Qur’an in her dream, her vision indicates the glory that the wise woman will attain and the glory that God will bestow upon her in the afterlife (Allah). Ready). Interpretation of dreams of reading the Qur’an in a dream, whoever sleeps while reading the Qur’an can relieve anxiety as long as he is anxious and if he does not gain from his trade, he will gain a lot from his trade, and if he is imprisoned, he can be released and the debtor can pay off these debts. Interpretation of dreams of reading the Qur’an in a dream with a beautiful voice in her dream, and the evidence of her vision is her closeness to God or that she will return from the wrong path and her repentance is accepted. Interpretation of a girl’s dream of reading the Qur’an in a dream means that God forgives her and she avoids disobedience. Interpretation of a dream of reading the Qur’an in a dream for the poor, as seeing it is evidence of wealth, luxury and richness. Interpretation of a dream of reading the Qur’an in a dream about a girl and that she reads it eloquently on the Day of Resurrection, but in reality she cannot read it in this way, as she sees her wealth after poverty and comfort after suffering. If a woman sees in her dream that she feels tired while reading the Qur’an, this means that she strives to excel in learning and succeed in knowledge and good and excellent performance after difficulties, and God Almighty helps her in that. Whoever sees himself listening to the recitation of the Qur’an in a dream, this is the heart of the owner of the vision related to the Qur’an. And his close connection with God Almighty Or hears someone else reciting while listening, this indicates that the dreamer is abandoning the Qur’an, and the dream is a reminder to her and encourages her to read the Qur’an again. The name of the call. *** It does not matter who saw in her dream that she is completing the Qur’an, the evidence of her vision is the satisfaction of desires, and the acceptance of her prayers. And because he finished reciting the Qur’an, he received the invitation after that. **** Whoever sees in a dream that he is reading a poem with hymns of mercy, forgiveness, heaven, and charity, the evidence of her vision is good, and the good of his world and its end will be new and good, God willing

title: Interpretation of sand in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of sand in a dream: Dreaming of sand in a dream is one of the wonderful dreams, so many people search for the interpretation of sand in a dream. This means that you have taken a new path in your life or you are worried about things that you cannot control. In this article, we will interpret sand in a dream through a different website. Seeing a dream about yellow sand. Interpretation of sand in a dream. Jurists say that the dreamer who sees yellow sand in his dream indicates his repentance from God. Interpretation of sand in a dream If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is collecting sand. Yellow, this means that he has stopped his livelihood and is unable to collect money and profits due to illness and his inability to work. Interpretation of sand in a dream But if the sand is red in a dream, then this type of vision is praiseworthy and indicates a high position and status. Interpretation of sand in a dream For patients who saw yellow sand in their dreams for recovery and complete recovery. Interpretation of sand in a dream If the sand is yellow in the dream and has a smooth texture, this means more offspring, wealth and fortune. Read also: Benefits of flax seeds for curly hairEating sand in the fleshEating sand in a dream A man indicates that the body is healthy and can recover from illness, but if the dreamer finds himself eating sand in the dream, this is a sign of wealth and enjoyment of life. Seeing a dreamer eating wet sand in his dream guarantees that the money he is looking for will get him and good things will fill his life. One commentator had different opinions from other commentators, as he said that if the observer dreams of eating sand, it means that he will earn money that is not halal because the money came from a forbidden path. Seeing him eating sand is praiseworthy because it indicates that the investment he will make is guaranteed. The return that will come from it will benefit the dreamer and benefit greatly from it. Sand in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of sand in a dream. Ibn Sirin said that if a girl sees herself sitting on the beach in her dream, this means that life is full of happiness, comfort, and tranquility. Interpretation of sand in a dream. Jurists say that for an unmarried woman A woman who sees sand in her dreams has three meanings: money and a means of livelihood to meet the dreamer’s needs and good things that will come to him soon. Interpretation of sand in a dream As for the story of a single woman dreaming of a smooth beach, it indicates that she will get rid of life’s problems one by one until she soon reaches a stage A clear and relaxed mind. Interpretation of sand in a dream: Seeing an unmarried woman lying on soft sand in her dream. This dream is a sign of her final marriage, and the marriage will be characterized by a good man who will make her happy. Interpretation of seeing sand in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen said: Seeing sand is a vision that has many connotations, some of which are beautiful. Some of them are bad. If you see a lot of sand in your dreams, it means that people are focusing on the world and staying away from religion. If you see in your dream that you are collecting a lot of sand, it means a lot of money, but seeing sand in plants means

title: Interpretation of a dream about a castle in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a castle in a dream according to Al-Osaimi, since the castle is a large building and its purpose is protection and strengthening, the vision in a dream has many positive effects, but this building can be large or small, and in the following lines we will explain to you multiple interpretations of this vision. So that everyone can benefit from it. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a castle in a dream Al-Osaimi Interpretation of this vision is as follows: Al-Osaimi states that the appearance of a castle in a dream generally indicates the protection and concern of the dreamer in the context of his professional and social life. An old castle in a dream can indicate To the fact that the dreamer is one of the closest people to God Almighty and is not affected by mistakes or sins because he is close to God Almighty. Al-Usaimi also sees a castle in a dream, this indicates victory over the enemy and safety from their conspiracies. If a single woman sees in a dream a knight in a castle, then this It indicates that a young man with a ghostly figure is approaching her. If the door of the castle is closed in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer has closed many possibilities. The open door of the castle represents good luck for this girl as she awaits her next life. See also: Backgrounds in the dream. According to Al-Osaimi, The interpretation is that he saw the castle in a dream. In interpreting this vision that many people are searching for, the following must be followed: Al-Usaimi states that the castle in a dream is a vision that represents the end of sadness and grief in which the dreamer lives. It also shows the locks of the curtains from the dream owner’s financial point of view. Or health. If you see the dreamer entering the castle sick, this may mean that he will recover soon. The destroyed castle in the dream may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to some crises and problems in the coming period. A pregnant woman who saw a palace in a dream tells us about the safety and health of the fetus. If a married woman sees that her husband is building a castle By herself, this indicates that her husband devotes himself to working to achieve everything that his wife and children want. Imam Al-Usaimi also mentioned that the castle in a dream indicates sufficient sustenance and a lot of money. See also: Daydreams. According to Al-Usaimi, the interpretation of seeing the castle in a dream. Al-Usaimi had a different opinion when he interpreted this vision on As follows: Al-Usaimi believes that the single young man who enters the castle in a dream will marry soon. As for the old castle, it may indicate that the past has appeared before the dreamer, but it affects his present. If a woman sees a palace in a dream, this may indicate the noble position she enjoys among People or it has a good reputation. Interpretation of seeing a castle in a man’s dream by Al-Osaimi: If one sees in a dream that he is climbing to the top of the castle and standing on that peak, then this is good, as the meaning of this vision is

title: Interpretation of a dream about stealing things from home in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of stealing things from the house in a dream: If someone sees that he has stolen some things from the house, this means that his family will be exposed to a major financial crisis. One commentator said that stealing things from the house means that the family will hear unpleasant news. See the point: Stealing in a dream. The dreamer is exposed to hatred and envy. And hatred, and God knows best. Stealing things from the house indicates the bad reputation of the owners of this house among the neighbors. Interpretation of a dream about stealing house furniture in a dream: a symbol of stealing house furniture in a dream, for many problems and disagreements between family members and family instability. If a married woman sees someone stealing furniture from the house, This dream indicates marital problems and disputes. Seeing a married woman’s furniture stolen indicates that the married woman does not feel safe and stable with her husband, and God knows best. If a man sees home furniture stolen in his dream, this means that this man will be exposed to a serious financial crisis. Interpretation of a dream about theft In a dream for a single woman: If a free girl sees being stolen in a dream, this vision means that she will be associated with an inappropriate person. Seeing an unmarried woman being robbed in a dream indicates many disagreements between her and her lover, and she will leave him soon, and God knows best. Seeing theft symbolizes the unmarried girl who works in A company, that she will leave her job due to many problems. If an unrelated person sees theft in a dream, and the girl was a student, it means that she will not succeed in academic exams. Interpretation of a dream of stealing clothes in a dream. Dream points: Stealing clothes in a dream, for many problems and crises that the dreamer will face. Seeing theft Clothes in a dream means that the dreamer cannot achieve his hopes and aspirations as a result of the problems he faces. Seeing clothes stolen for a worker, this means that the thief in a dream will steal his efforts in the reality of work and in relation to himself. Seeing a married woman stealing clothes in a dream symbolizes that her husband will betray her and may It leads to their separation. Interpretation of a dream about theft from the house states a dream about robbery from the house In the dream, the dreamer commits sins, transgressions, and bad deeds that affect his family. Theft from the house in the dreamer’s dream indicates that family members will hear unpleasant news, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Theft from a house in a dream indicates a large number of Conflicts that occur between family members that lead to the disintegration of the family. One commentator said that stealing a house indicates that the dreamer is committing sins and sins and must draw closer to God. Interpretation of a dream about stealing money from a bag A dream about stealing money from Askos means that the dreamer is characterized as a spendthrift who spends his money on things that he does not Benefit or benefit. Seeing money stolen from the bag symbolizes that the dreamer is confused and cannot make the right decision at the moment. If water is stolen from the travel bag, this means that the dreamer will not be able to achieve what he wants and will return from the trip with a broken heart. Theft in The dream in general indicates a large number of enemies and envy around the fortuneteller, so he must be careful. Interpretation of a dream about stealing money

title: The 30 most accurate interpretations of a dream of a single woman driving a car with someone, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dream about someone driving a car with someone: An unmarried girl may see that she is driving a car next to another person, whether this person is unknown or known to her. The vision needs clarification and interpretation. Based on the sayings of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin and other scholars, learn more. Interpretations of the vision according to the various details contained in it. Interpretation of a dream of a single woman driving a car with someone. If an unmarried girl sees that she is riding with one of her acquaintances and is already suffering from delayed marriage, she will soon receive happy news, and this news may belong to someone she knows that is presented to her. But if The car she is driving is black, the vision shows that she is on the verge of some worries and problems in her life, but she will soon get rid of them and continue her normal life without any problems. The green color of the car indicates the abundance of livelihood that he obtains, and if he has the desire to work, he will have a suitable job. It brings him a lot of money. A brother or friend. In the interpretation of that dream, it was said that the owner is going through a crisis in her life and wants a loyal person by her side so that she can face the crisis and achieve psychological stability after that. If she knows this person, she will marry a young man who has the qualities of piety and justice and will live with him in peace and stability. She dreams Riding in the car with someone from Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shirin said that this vision has a different meaning depending on the psychological state of the pioneer. If he seems happy, more good things will come. If the fortuneteller is a man, his vision shows a partnership between him and the car driver, and that he depends on him for many things. Taken quickly. As for a married woman who sees herself in a car with one person, this may indicate a weak character and her inability to manage her affairs on her own, and she may be in dire need of some advice from those close to her in order to escape from it. The problems she faces in her life. Interpretation of the dream of driving in a car with someone she loves for individuals. This vision indicates that she will emerge from the crisis she is experiencing due to the delay in her marriage and will soon move from her father’s house to her husband’s house, with whom she lives happily and happily. It was said that the vision is evidence of the parents’ satisfaction with This is the person who loves the girl, and that he will soon propose to her to officially unite with her, and that he is the right person to marry her in any case, and this was the opinion of Ibn Sirin. There are some interpretive scholars who stated that the dreamer had a strong desire to marry this person, so she kept her feelings in check. Her subconscious mind then appeared in the form of a vision in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of driving in a car with someone you love for individuals. Interpretation of a dream of driving in a car with someone I know for individuals. The vision has more than one meaning for a single woman. If this person appears to have a calm and peaceful appearance, then the dream is an indication of improvement and change in his situation. For the better. But if he drives the car very fast and makes her feel afraid, unpleasant changes may occur in the girl’s life. But if she does not feel fear while driving the car quickly, she will soon receive marriage offers, and she will choose the most beautiful woman.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person taking a child

preview.html: To see that the dead person was near the dreamer and he took his son here, this is evidence of the death of one of the dreamer’s family, and seeing the dream indicates difficulties and bad things, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead person taking a child in a dream about a single girl. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees that a dead person She knows him well and he was taking a small child from her in a dream. It indicates that she will face some problems in her life, and she is trying hard to get rid of them. Likewise, an unmarried girl seeing in a dream that she is looking at the deceased taking an unknown child in a dream. It is a sign that she will face separation from her dearest person. In life, God is Most High and All-Knowing. An unmarried girl who saw a dead person forcefully taking her child in a dream and felt sorry for him indicates that she will experience some bad and sad things in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. While an unmarried woman who looks at a dead person in a dream and feels sad, while She takes the child in a dream. It explains that she will experience a very big problem in her life, and this will hinder her happiness. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone she loves and crying over him. Interpretation of watching a dead person take a child in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that the unknown dead person takes her unknown child. It explains She will face some big problems with her husband in this period of her life. If a married woman in a dream tries to remove the child from the dead person. It shows her great knowledge of a difficult issue in her life and that she is trying hard to solve it. While a married woman sees in a dream looking at the dead, she takes the child and cries over him. A clear indication that she will face some major crises in her life, and God knows best. The same is true for a married woman as she looks at the child in her arms and the dead person takes it from her. An indication that she will witness a great separation from one of her dearest ones in life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a dead child taking a child. In a dream for a divorced woman. As for the divorced woman who sees in a dream that the dead person takes a child from her, and she cries loudly, this is an indication of a great ordeal that she will face and experience in this season of her life, and God knows best. As for the divorced woman who looks at the dead person in a dream while she takes a child from her, she was also trying hard. An indication of her great attachment to a difficult matter in her life, and she will abandon it in the coming period. Likewise, the divorced woman who dreams that the deceased was taking her child while crying. A clear explanation of some of the major crises that she will see and experience during this time. Likewise, the divorced woman who sees her ex-husband pulling her child From death. She announces that she will return to her ex-husband and live a happy life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a dead person taking a child in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a person sees in a dream that an unknown dead person takes a child from him in a dream, then he feels very sorry. He explains that During this period, he will face some big problems and troubles in his life. Likewise, seeing a man in a dream that he is looking at the dead, while taking from his unknown child in the dream. This indicates something very difficult for this dreamer.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hair lice and killing it by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing it. The truth is that lice are harmful insects and seeing them in a dream has many meanings and connotations, some of which express evil, crises, and difficult times, and others bring with them good news and good luck. Interpretations related to seeing lice in the hair in the article below. What does it mean to have lice in the hair and killing it in a dream? There are many indications and meanings related to seeing lice in the hair and killing it, the most important of which are the following: Interpretation of a dream of lice in the hair and killing the dreamer in a dream, in which there is a clear indication of That you will wear a dress of luxury in the near future. If a negligent person in the medical profession dreams that lice comes out of a person’s hair and kills him, then this is a sign that he is watching God while he does his work and provides medical services at the highest level. If a person dreams in a dream that he is pulling lice out of his hair with difficulty, then this A clear indication that he will suffer for a long time before he recovers from the health problems that befell him. Interpretation of a dream about having a large lice in the hair and infecting the head, and then the dreamer pulls it out of his hair so that he can overcome all the difficulties and crises that he faces in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about hair lice And his killing by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the meanings and connotations associated with seeing lice in a dream, which are as follows: If a prisoner dreams that he removes lice from his head and then kills her, then this is a clear sign that the hour of his innocence will be revealed and the joy of his salvation from punishment is near. If a person sees in a dream a number A small number of lice in the hair, then he uprooted them and killed them, this is clear evidence that he will triumph over his opponents and that God will save him from their machinations. The person who watches himself removes the lice from his head, but finds that the work has returned in abundance and filled it again, which is a sign that God will save him from The oppressor is wronged, but he is exposed to injustice and injustice. Injustice again, so he is patient with grief and prayer. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing it in Nabulsi. The great scholar Nabulsi explained many meanings and associations associated with seeing lice in the hair and killing it, the most important of which are the following: From the point of view of the Nabulsi scholar, if a person sees lice in his dream, this is clear evidence that he He will be exposed to a serious health problem that will affect him negatively. If a person sees in his dream that lice are spreading everywhere around him, this is a clear indication of many enemies who hate him and are conspiring against him to ruin his life, so he must be careful. If the dreamer is married and sees lice walking on Her clothes in a dream are a sign of marital happiness and the strength of the relationship between her and her partner. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing it by Ibn ShaheenSeeing lice in the hair and killing it from the point of view of the scholar Ibn Shaheen has many interpretations and connotations, the most important of which are the following: If a person sees lice in his hair in a dream and kills them This is a clear indication of the corruption and taboos of his life, but he will regret what he did in the very near future. If a person dreams of lice in the hair and killing him, positive changes will occur in his life that will make him better than he was before. Interpretation of the dream of lice in the hair and killing a woman is not

If a person sees in his dream that lice are spreading everywhere around him, this is a clear indication of many enemies who hate him and are conspiring against him to ruin his life, so he must be careful. If the dreamer is married and sees lice walking on Her clothes in a dream are a sign of marital happiness and the strength of the relationship between her and her partner. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing it by Ibn ShaheenSeeing lice in the hair and killing it from the point of view of the scholar Ibn Shaheen has many interpretations and connotations, the most important of which are the following: If a person sees lice in his hair in a dream and kills them This is a clear indication of the corruption and taboos of his life, but he will regret what he did in the very near future. If a person dreams of lice in the hair and killing him, positive changes will occur in his life that will make him better than he was before.
